title: WTF, WFT?
description:
Mina and Ollie Connolly of The Guardian and The Read Optional discuss the issues with the Patriots' offense, what's gone wrong for the Washington defense, the positive vibes coming from the Chargers' offense, and look ahead to a great weekend in the NFC West.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
